channel.title: Hidding My Client Files
channel.description: I'm thinking of hidding my client files. When I delete all the .java files, it still has the ip address in the egui .classfile. So I'm thinking of putting them all in jar files can anyone help? And also I need to know how to make it so every client updates, instead of releasing a new one everytime i make updates.

item.title: Hidding My Client Files
item.dc:creator: @kinta kinta
item.description:
@kinta wrote:

I was thinking of more making a .jar file, because people can see the hidden files. It’s easy, Tools > W/e > See hidden files.

Read full topic

item.title: Hidding My Client Files
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

you can right click them and select hidden.

Read full topic
